subject: Players Championship (Golf)
Golf
United States Open (Golf)
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Unpredictability was expected at Pinehurst, which had been restored to look as it did in the 1930s, but some of the results of Thursday’s first round looked overly retro.
snippet: Unpredictability was expected at Pinehurst, which had been restored to look as it did in the 1930s, but some of the results of Thursday’s first round looked overly retro.
